name: Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink (Full)
name_original: Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink (Full)
description:
FANTASTIC HIDDEN OBJECT PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME FROM THE CREATORS OF ENIGMATIS AND GRIM LEGENDS!

Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink is an adventure game in the steampunk genre. It is a detective drama featuring action elements such espionage, monster battles and even hang-gliding!

38 hand drawn locations in a unique steampunk setting!
A string of mysterious earthquakes is causing the world’s cities to crumble to ruin. Dr. Ambrose Ink hopes to expose the true story behind this supernatural phenomenon which puzzles everyone.

Immersive detective story with adventure action!
His research leads him to Hochwald, a town nestled high in the mountains near the mysterious castle of the Barber family. Yet, shortly after arriving at the estate, Dr. Ink disappears.

Face puzzles, mini games, and hidden objects!
It’s up to Dr. Ink’s longtime friend Agent Evangeline Glass to save Dr. Ink and learn the story behind the earthquakes. With only a mechanical raven to guide her, she must find her way through all the mini games, puzzles, and hidden object scenes in the well-secured castle and face the General Engineer of Gottland.

Sneak into Hochwald Castle as Dr. Ink in Collector’s Edition!
Experience additional content with a bonus chapter that tells the story from Dr. Ink’s perspective. Enjoy plenty of new hidden objects in extra HO scenes as well as an immersive, ly composed soundtrack and hand painted concept art.

Bring all the hidden object puzzle adventure games with you!
Optimized for phones and tablets, filled with hidden objects, perfect for playing while traveling. No - wifi required for this offline game!

Sign up to our newsletter for new adventure games every Month!
Captivating adventures, stories, tales and eerie mysteries await in our selection of immersive hidden object puzzle games!

Look for “Artifex Mundi” to get more hidden object puzzle adventure games like this!

• Mechanical crow Matthew is player’s sidekick
• 31 (38 in CE ) beautiful, hand-drawn locations
• 30+ hidden steambugs to find
• Bonus adventure (“Ink’s Story”) is a prequel to the main one.
